body: libprotobuf.a is built and included as hidden in libcaffe2.so. That means that any other user of protobuf's exposed from there (libtorch.so, _C, etc.) and even outside parties will need to link against it. However, this might not be needed... I did a lot of iteration on this PR, so I should verify first. Sounds like we should limit to libprotobuf.a if at all?
